author: Special Correspondent
text: An inspection by a team of 37 engineers of the Tamil Nadu Generation and Distribution Corporation undertaken in Melur area last week revealed power theft by a consumer. The team, led by P. Palanisamy, Executive Engineer, inspected 3,717 power connections. A fine of Rs. 23, 232 was imposed for the power theft, according to a Tangedco press release.
title: Power theft detected
